precautions: Tell your doctor immediately if you are allergic to any of the ingredients used in this tablet. Consult your doctor before taking this tablet if you have an electrocardiogram fluctuating problem, hypokalemia. Consult your doctor if you are using any anti-fungal medicines along with this tablet. It is because Kestine tablet reacts with anti-fungal medicines and result in damage of the body. Some other medicines that can react with this tablet include macrolide antibiotics such as erythromycin.Consult your doctor if you are using anti-tuberculosis medicine such as rifampicin, if you have severe liver problems, if you are using Kestine tablet for a really long time. You are also experiencing dry mouth and dehydration problems for some time. Must tell your doctor about this and try to keep yourself hydrated all the time by taking adequate supplements.This medicine can be taken with or without meals; if you are breast-feeding, or pregnant, or planning to be pregnant, contact your doctor before taking this medicine. details: This medication treats symptoms such as Itching, Runny nose, Watery eyes, and Sneezing from "Hay fever" and other allergies.
precautions: Consult your doctor first if you have certain medical conditions such as, Kidney disease, Liver disease. This medication passes into breast milk. However, it is unlikely to harm a nursing infant. During pregnancy, this medication should be used only when clearly needed.
effects: This drug usually has no side effects, Allergic reactions may occur such as severe Dizziness, Trouble breathing, Angioedema.
